Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    inra.ijpb.binary.ConnectedComponents
    all methods have been moved to the BinaryImages class
    inra.ijpb.morphology.LabelImages
    as from 2014.11.03, replaced by class inra.ijpb.label.LabelImages
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    inra.ijpb.watershed.MarkerControlledWatershedTransform2D.applyWithSortedList()
    The algorithm with a sorted list does not visit the pixels based on their h value and proximity to markers so it is not a true watershed method.
    inra.ijpb.watershed.MarkerControlledWatershedTransform3D.applyWithSortedList()
    The algorithm with a sorted list does not visit the voxels based on their h value and proximity to markers so it is not a true watershed method.
    inra.ijpb.watershed.MarkerControlledWatershedTransform2D.applyWithSortedListAndDams()
    The algorithm with a sorted list does not visit the pixels based on their h value and proximity to markers so it is not a true watershed method.
    inra.ijpb.watershed.MarkerControlledWatershedTransform3D.applyWithSortedListAndDams()
    The algorithm with a sorted list does not visit the voxels based on their h value and proximity to markers so it is not a true watershed method.
    inra.ijpb.binary.ConnectedComponents.computeLabels(ImagePlus, int, int)
    replaced by BinaryImages.componentsLabeling(ImagePlus, int, int)
    inra.ijpb.binary.ConnectedComponents.computeLabels(ImageProcessor, int, int)
    replaced by BinaryImages.componentsLabeling(ImageProcessor, int, int)
    inra.ijpb.binary.ConnectedComponents.computeLabels(ImageStack, int, int)
    replaced by BinaryImages.componentsLabeling(ImageStack, int, int)
    inra.ijpb.watershed.Watershed.computeWatershed(ImagePlus, ImagePlus, ImagePlus, int, boolean, boolean)
    The algorithm with a sorted list does not visit the voxels based on their h value and proximity to markers so it is not a true watershed method and we will stop using it.
    inra.ijpb.watershed.Watershed.computeWatershed(ImagePlus, ImagePlus, int, boolean, boolean)
    The algorithm with a sorted list does not visit the voxels based on their h value and proximity to markers so it is not a true watershed method and we will stop using it.
    inra.ijpb.watershed.Watershed.computeWatershed(ImageProcessor, ImageProcessor, ImageProcessor, int, boolean, boolean)
    The algorithm with a sorted list does not visit the voxels based on their h value and proximity to markers so it is not a true watershed method and we will stop using it.
    inra.ijpb.watershed.Watershed.computeWatershed(ImageProcessor, ImageProcessor, int, boolean, boolean)
    The algorithm with a sorted list does not visit the voxels based on their h value and proximity to markers so it is not a true watershed method and we will stop using it.
    inra.ijpb.watershed.Watershed.computeWatershed(ImageStack, ImageStack, ImageStack, int, boolean, boolean)
    The algorithm with a sorted list does not visit the voxels based on their h value and proximity to markers so it is not a true watershed method and we will stop using it.
    inra.ijpb.watershed.Watershed.computeWatershed(ImageStack, ImageStack, int, boolean, boolean)
    The algorithm with a sorted list does not visit the voxels based on their h value and proximity to markers so it is not a true watershed method and we will stop using it.
    inra.ijpb.measure.GeometricMeasures2D.croftonPerimeter(ImageProcessor, double[], int)
    use analyzeRegions instead
    inra.ijpb.watershed.MarkerControlledWatershedTransform2D.getAnimationSortedList()
    The algorithm with a sorted list does not visit the pixels based on their h value and proximity to markers so it is not a true watershed method.
    inra.ijpb.watershed.MarkerControlledWatershedTransform2D.getAnimationSortedListAndDams()
    The algorithm with a sorted list does not visit the pixels based on their h value and proximity to markers so it is not a true watershed method.
    inra.ijpb.plugins.MorphologicalSegmentation.segment(String, String, String, String)
    the priority queue method is now the only one
